lead_paragraph: Stocks fell broadly, yields on U.S government bond rose to their highest level in two months, and oil prices continued to climb.

headline.print_headline: Wall St. Slides on Worries Over Economic Growth
headline.main: Market Continues Slide After a Weak Hiring Report and Mixed Earnings

snippet: Stocks fell broadly, yields on U.S government bond rose to their highest level in two months, and oil prices continued to climb.
abstract: Stocks fall as investors worry over stock valuations, economic growth and climbing interest rates.
